Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored an early goal in the 7th minute to give Slovakia a 1-0 lead.
VAR ruled out 2 goals by Romelu Lukaku for Belgium.
Slovakia delivered the first major shock result of Euro 2024 by defeating Belgium 1-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Deutsche Bank Park in Frankfurt, Germany.
Belgium had 60.4% possession while Slovakia had 39.6%.
Belgium had 16 shot attempts with 5 on goal, while Slovakia had 10 shot attempts with 4 on goal.
